title: Tricks
description: Carol is getting letters from someone. She doesn't know who it is. A letter covered in blood. She laughs it off as just a Halloween prank. Then, she gets the letter with the picture inside. A dead animal hung to her door. She tells her sister, Tory, and she thinks they are all just TRICKS being played on Carol. Are they? Her friend, Marsha, is going to have this huge Halloween party. Carol is very excited... but frightened at the same time. At the party the TRICKS stop and the murder begins. This is the complete collection of the Tricks series by Matthew Leeth. It contains the short-stories Tricks # 1-3.
author: Matthew Leeth
